exceptions.exn: In environment n, i : nat l : list (mm_instr (pos n)) Unable to unify "encode_mm_instr ?M1497 (?M1498 ++ ?M1499) = encode_mm_instr ?M1497 ?M1498 ++ encode_mm_instr (length ?M1498 + ?M1497) ?M1499" with "Forall (fun c : nat * nat => snd c <> 0) (encode_mm_instr i l)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
i: nat
n: nat
l: list (mm_instr (pos n))

Goal:
fractran_regular (encode_mm_instr i l)

Premises:
encode_mm_instr : forall m : nat, nat -> list (mm_instr (pos m)) -> list (nat * nat)
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
fractran_regular = fun l : list (nat * nat) => Forall (fun c : nat * nat => snd c <> 0) l : list (nat * nat) -> Prop Arguments fractran_regular _%list_scope
Notation pos := Fin.t
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive mm_instr (X : Set) : Set := mm_inc : X -> mm_instr X | mm_dec : X -> nat -> mm_instr X Arguments mm_instr _%type_scope Arguments mm_inc [X]%type_scope Arguments mm_dec [X]%type_scope _ _%nat_scope
encode_mm_instr_regular : forall (n i : nat) (l : list (mm_instr (pos n))), Forall (fun c : nat * nat => fst c <> 0 /\ snd c <> 0) (encode_mm_instr i l)
encode_mm_instr_app : forall (m i : nat) (l r : list (mm_instr (pos m))), encode_mm_instr i (l ++ r) = encode_mm_instr i l ++ encode_mm_instr (length l + i) r
mm_no_self_loops_app : forall (n i : nat) (P Q : list (mm_instr (pos n))), mm_no_self_loops (i, P) -> mm_no_self_loops (length P + i, Q) -> mm_no_self_loops (i, P ++ Q)
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat i : nat l : list (mm_instr (pos n)) |- nat]
mm_no_self_loops : forall n : nat, nat * list (mm_instr (pos n)) -> Prop
MM_PROBLEM = {n : nat & {_ : list (mm_instr (pos n)) & vec nat n}} : Set
subcode_cons_invert_left : forall (X : Type) (Q : code X) (i : nat) (I : X) (l : list X), (i, I :: l) <sc Q -> (i, [I]) <sc Q /\ (S i, l) <sc Q
FRACTRAN_REG_PROBLEM = {l : list (nat * nat) & {_ : nat | fractran_regular l}} : Set
mm_remove_self_loops : forall (n : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))), {Q : list (mm_instr (pos (S n))) | mm_no_self_loops (1, Q) /\ (forall (i : nat) (x : pos (S n)) (j : nat), (i, [DECₐ x j]) <sc (1, Q) -> j < 1 + length Q) /\ (forall v : vec nat n, (1, P) /MM/ (1, v) ↓ <-> (1, Q) /MM/ (1, 0 ## v) ↓)}
mm_sss_fun : forall (n : nat) (i : mm_instr (pos n)) (s t1 t2 : mm_state n), i // s -1> t1 -> i // s -1> t2 -> t1 = t2
fractran_rt_no_zero_den_0_0 : forall l : list (nat * nat), l <> [] -> fractran_regular l -> l /F/ 0 → 0
FRACTRAN_HALTING_l_0_no_zero_den : forall l : list (nat * nat), l <> [] -> fractran_regular l -> FRACTRAN_HALTING (l, 0) < -> False
MMA_PROBLEM = fun n : nat => (list (mm_instr (pos n)) * vec nat n)%type : nat -> Set Arguments MMA_PROBLEM _%nat_scope
fractran_steps = fun l : list (nat * nat) => rel_iter (fractran_step l) : list (nat * nat) -> nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments fractran_steps _%list_scope (_ _ _)%nat_scope
fractran_rt_no_zero_den : forall (l : list (nat * nat)) (n y : nat), fractran_regular l -> l /F/ 0 -[ n ] -> y -> y = 0
subcode_app_end : forall (X : Type) (P : code X) (n : nat) (l r : list X), P <sc (n, l) -> P <sc (n, l ++ r)
fractran_step_no_zero_den : forall (l : list (nat * nat)) (x y : nat), fractran_regular l -> l /F/ x → y -> x = 0 -> y = 0
Forall_cons : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> Forall P (x :: l)
fractran_step_fun : forall (l : list (nat * nat)) (x y1 y2 : nat), fractran_regular l -> l /F/ x → y1 -> l /F/ x → y2 -> y1 = y2
fractran_step_bound : forall l : list (nat * nat), fractran_regular l -> {k : nat | forall x y : nat, l /F/ x → y -> y <= k * x}
subcode_in_code : forall (X : Type) (P : code X) (Q : nat * list X) (i : nat), P <sc Q -> in_code i P -> in_code i Q
fractran_step_ind : forall P : list (nat * nat) -> nat -> nat -> Prop, (forall (p q : nat) (l : list (nat * nat)) (x y : nat), q * y = p * x -> P ((p, q) :: l) x y) -> (forall (p q : nat) (l : list (nat * nat)) (x y : nat), ~ divides q (p * x) -> l /F/ x → y -> P l x y -> P ((p, q) :: l) x y) -> forall (l : list (nat * nat)) (n n0 : nat), l /F/ n → n0 -> P l n n0
mm_self_loop_no_term_1 : forall (n : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (s : nat * vec nat n) (v : vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x i]) <sc (1, P) -> s = (i, v) -> v#>x = 0 -> ~ (1, P) /MM/ s ↓
mm_compute_INC : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [INCₐ x]) <sc P -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) st -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
mm_progress_INC : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [INCₐ x]) <sc P -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) st -> sss_progress (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
mm_compute_DEC_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x k]) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (k, v) st -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
mm_progress_DEC_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x k]) <sc P -> v#>x = 0 -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (k, v) st -> sss_progress (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
Inductive Forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := Forall_nil : Forall P [] | Forall_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> Forall P (x :: l) Arguments Forall [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Forall_nil [A]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Forall_cons [A]%type_scope [P]%function_scope _ [l]%list_scope
mm_self_loop_no_term_2 : forall (n : nat) (P : list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (s : nat * vec nat n) (v : vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x (1 + i); DECₐ x i]) <sc (1, P) -> s = (i, v) \/ s = (1 + i, v) -> v#>x = 0 -> ~ (1, P) /MM/ s ↓
in_out_code : forall (X : Type) (i : nat) (P : code X), in_code i P -> out_code i P -> False
mm_progress_DEC_S : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x k]) <sc P -> v#>x = S u -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (1 + i, v[u/x]) st -> sss_progress (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
mm_compute_DEC_S : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x k]) <sc P -> v#>x = S u -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (1 + i, v[u/x]) st -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
in_sss_step : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (k : nat) (l : list instr) (i : instr) (r : list instr) (st1 st2 : nat * data), fst st1 = k + length l -> one_step i st1 st2 -> sss_step one_step (k, l ++ i :: r) st1 st2
pos_O_inv = let pos_inv_t := fun n : nat => match n as x return (pos x -> Set) with | 0 => fun _ : pos 0 => False | S n0 => fun i : pos (S n0) => ((i = pos0) + {p : pos n0 | i = pos_nxt p})%type end in let pos_inv := fun (_tmp : nat) (p0 : pos _tmp) => match p0 as t in (pos n) return (pos_inv_t n t) with | @Fin.F1 n => inl eq_refl | @Fin.FS n p => inr (exist (fun p1 : pos n => pos_nxt p = pos_nxt p1) p eq_refl) end in pos_inv 0 : pos 0 -> False
mm_steps_INC_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [INCₐ x]) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> P /MM/ (i, v) -[ k ] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P /MM/ (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) -[ k' ] -> st
mm_special_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), Q se -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, [ρ]) <sc P -> ρ // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (j, w) se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, sss_compute (mm_sss (n:=n)) P s se -> Q s
mm_steps_DEC_0_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p : nat) (v : vec nat n) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x p]) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = 0 -> P /MM/ (i, v) -[ k ] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P /MM/ (p, v) -[ k' ] -> st
mm_term_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (se : nat * vec nat n) (Q : nat * vec nat n -> Prop), (out_code (fst se) P -> Q se) -> (forall (i : nat) (ρ : mm_instr (pos n)) (v : vec nat n) (j : nat) (w : vec nat n), (i, [ρ]) <sc P -> ρ // (i, v) -1> (j, w) -> sss_output (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (j, w) se -> Q (j, w) -> Q (i, v)) -> forall s : nat * vec nat n, sss_output (mm_sss (n:=n)) P s se -> Q s
encode_one_instr : forall m : nat, nat -> mm_instr (pos m) -> list (nat * nat)
mm_steps_DEC_1_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat) (st : nat * vec nat n), (i, [DECₐ x p]) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> v#>x = S u -> P /MM/ (i, v) -[ k ] -> st -> exists k' : nat, k' < k /\ P /MM/ (1 + i, v[u/x]) -[ k' ] -> st
